titleStmt.title: The Kings letter to the lords: sent by the Prince On the behalfe of the Earle of Straffords. And the Lords answer to his Majestie. With the Earle of Straffords letter to His Majestie, 4. May. together with his speech upon the scaffold, and the manner of his execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
